data.title: THE VOTE: How Congress voted on the marriage amendment
data.meta_description: WASHINGTON (BP)--Following is the House of Representatives' vote tally on the Marriage Protection Amendment. The amendment fell short of the required 290 votes but did receive a majority of support Sept. 30. The vote was 227-186.
data.text:
WASHINGTON (BP)–Following is the House of Representatives’ vote tally on the Marriage Protection Amendment. The amendment fell short of the required 290 votes but did receive a majority of support Sept. 30. The vote was 227-186.

House of Representatives

Marriage Protection Amendment
